item.title: The Race-Hustling Illegal Running Des Moines Schools Indicts The Entire System
item.description: Democrats are protesting Des Moines Superintendent Ian Roberts' arrest by ICE because he indicts the entire public school system they control.

item.title: Britain Is Turning Its Back On Western Civilization
item.description: By praising cousin marriage, the National Health Service is repudiating Britain’s Christian past in favor of its unassimilated Muslims.

item.description: U.S. politics is a tinder box right now, and leftists like California Gov. Gavin Newsom and Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker keep striking matches.

item.title: It’s OK To Be Angry Over Charlie Kirk’s Murder
item.description: It’s not revenge we’re after; it’s a reckoning.
